definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, most notably associated with J.D. Vance, an American author and politician.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作姓氏，最著名的是指美国作家兼政治家 J.D. 万斯。
definitions.example_en: J.D. Vance's book 'Hillbilly Elegy' brought widespread attention to the struggles of working-class Americans.
definitions.example_cn: J.D. 万斯的著作《乡下人的悲歌》让世人广泛关注美国工人阶级所面临的困境。
